snippet: Devyani Khobragade’s case and the issues it raised are not resolved and will not likely dissipate soon.
abstract: Editorial contends issues raised by case against Indian diplomat Devyani Khobragade have not been resolved, and the damage to India-America relations is unlikely to dissipate soon; maintains case has exposed differences between the two countries over basic concepts like fairness and equality, and has revealed a troubling level of Indian animosity toward the United States.
lead_paragraph: Devyani Khobragade’s case and the issues it raised are not resolved and will not likely dissipate soon.
